panels.description: Count of Total Critical Errors

targets.expr: count(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", severity="critical", sitename="T2_US_Caltech"}) or label_replace(0 * absent(ALERTS{sitename="T2_US_Caltech"}), "sitename", "T2_US_Caltech", "", "")

panels.title: Total Critical Errors

panels.description: Count of Total Warnings at Site

targets.expr: count(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", severity="warning", sitename="T2_US_Caltech"}) or label_replace(0 * absent(ALERTS{sitename="T2_US_Caltech"}), "sitename", "T2_US_Caltech", "", "")

panels.title: Total Warnings

panels.description: Count of all Total Virtual Switching Requests

targets.expr:
sum(max by (key0) (
  network_status{action="vsw", sitename="T2_US_Caltech"}
))
or
label_replace(
  0 * absent(network_status{action="vsw", sitename="T2_US_Caltech"}),
  "sitename", 
  "T2_US_Caltech", 
  "", 
  ""
)

panels.title: Total VSW Requests

panels.description: Count of all Total Active Virtual Switching Requests

targets.expr:
sum(max by (key0) (
  network_status{action="vsw", sitename="T2_US_Caltech", network_status="activated"}
))
or
label_replace(
  0 * absent(network_status{action="vsw", sitename="T2_US_Caltech"}),
  "sitename", 
  "T2_US_Caltech", 
  "", 
  ""
)

panels.title: Active VSW Requests

panels.description: Count of all Total Not Active Virtual Switching Requests

targets.expr:
sum(max by (key0) (
  network_status{action="vsw", sitename="T2_US_Caltech", network_status!="activated", network_status!="unknown", network_status!="unset"}
))
or
label_replace(
  0 * absent(network_status{action="vsw", sitename="T2_US_Caltech"}),
  "sitename", 
  "T2_US_Caltech", 
  "", 
  ""
)

panels.title: Not Active VSW Requests

panels.description: ICMP V4 Round Trip time from Prometheus hosts to SiteRM Frontend.
panels.title: ICMP round trip time (V4)

panels.description: ICMP V6 Round Trip time from Prometheus hosts to SiteRM Frontend.
panels.title: ICMP round trip time (V6)

panels.description: Left lifetime for SSL Certificate validity. It will raise an alarm once less than a week is left.
panels.title: SSL Expiry

panels.description: HTTP Connection timeline.
panels.title: HTTP Duration

panels.description: HTTP Return Code. 200 OK, Anything else - failure. In case of failure - it will alert.
panels.title: HTTP Status Code

panels.description: Individual Service Status for Site Frontend and all Agents.
panels.title: Service Status

panels.description: Individual SiteRM Thread Runtime. Only for debugging purposes of stuck processes.
panels.title: SiteRM Threads Runtime

panels.description: All SiteRM Component's statuses are grouped by hostname and service state (only Running correctly) over time. 1 - service runs normally. Below 1 - Service has failed for some reason. If failure - it will alert.
panels.title: SiteRM Component Status

panels.description: All SiteRM Component's statuses are grouped by hostname and service state over time. 1+OK - service runs normally. Below 1 or not OK - Service has failed for some reason.
panels.title: SiteRM Component Status (NOT OK)

panels.description: SiteRM Frontend Memory statistics for all processes. Only for debugging purposes.
panels.title: SiteRM FE Thread Memory Monitoring (VMS)

panels.description: SiteRM Frontend Memory statistics for all processes. Only for debugging purposes.
panels.title: SiteRM FE Thread Memory Monitoring (RSS)

panels.description: Running SiteRM Versions at Site.
panels.title: Running Versions

panels.description: Checks if Prometheus is able to receive monitoring data for this specific Site DTNs. 1 means OK, 0 means failure.
panels.title: Able to receive monitoring data from DTNs
